wdi2-SI.POV.MDIM.17.XQ.def: Proportion of the child population that is multidimensionally poor adjusted by the intensity of the deprivations
wdi2-SI.POV.MDIM.17.XQ.name: Multidimensional poverty index
wdi2-SI.POV.MDIM.17.XQ.source: Government statistical agencies. Data for EU countires are from the EUROSTAT
